title: Greatness
lyrics:
44 ContributorsTranslationsPortuguêsTürkçeРусскийGreatness Lyrics[Intro]
(Al Geno on the track)
Yeah, yeah
Huncho, yeah

[Verse]
My chain, my watch, my wrist, my motherfuckin' house, my rise and grind (Grind)
I'd give away all this shit just to see my dog just one more time
Look up at the lights one time (One time)
Hit the stage, rock the mic one time (One time)
Roll one, get right one time (Hey)
Two cups, two cups, two cups (Ooh)
You remember them MCM backpacks? We was runnin' around with them racks (Racks)
No Wock', no Wock', ain't never took Wock' to Poland, I was drinking that Act' (On God)
Came in, swept the game like a storm with the motherfuckin' flow, nigga, Take' did that (On God)
So don't ask about the group, he gone, we gone, young nigga, it can't come back (Damn)
I'ma make sure mama straight (Mama)
Especially mama Take' (Treet)
I can't kick it with a fake (Nah)
And I won't sleep with the snakes (Snakes)
I'd rather eat with the greats (Greats)
I wanted peace, but I can't (Peace)
I gotta get somethin' straight
Hold on, wait, huh (Pew, pew, pew)
Tryna move forward, but I don't got all the answers (I don't got the answers)
But I know I can't look backwards, that's dangerous (That's dangerous)
Uh, I had to go read the Bible and take a few pages (Take a few pages)
Huncho influence, lil' nigga, now I turn the pages, I turn the pages (Uh)
Never forget that the Migos amazin' (Migos)
Look at the ice and the knot in my pants, you know that them young niggas made it (Ice)
Get your mind right, lil' nigga, you never know, you could be famous (You)
I got this shit out the mud and caught a lil' buzz, then QC changed it (QC)
Faces, faces (Faces), all kind of faces (For real)
All kind of faces (On God), we all God's babies (On God)
We all built with greatness (Built), we all came in dangerous (Dangerous)
We bound to fall against the odds, we get up and go crazy
And we face it (Face it), we face it (Come on)
Whatever type, we face it (Whatever)
The time it takes to get it (Time), the time it take to make it (To make it)
The time it take to lose it (Time), the time it take to take it (Take it)
The time it take to win (Time), this time you made the greatest (Greatest, yeah)
You might also like[Outro]
Yeah, you made the greatest time with your life (Yeah)
Right now, it's greatness (Yeah)
You picked the perfect time in the world, it's right now (Yeah)
That time is greatness (Ooh)
I don't care how long it take (Yeah), I don't care what storm you been through, it's greatness (Yeah)
This how legends is born (Ah)
Greatness (Ooh)
I couldn't do it without the greatest group in the world (Yeah, yeah)
Hmm, greatness
I couldn't do it without the greatest nephew in the world (Oh, no)
Greatness
I love my mama (Mama, mama), I love my sister
Greatness (I love, I love)
My niece, greatness (I love, I love)
Lingo (Huh, greatness, yeah)
To infinity (Yeah, yeah), no stronger link in the world
Greatness (Uh-huh)
Uh-huh, greatness6Embed
